summary: Adds Snake/ Big Boss as a follower to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
You can find him at The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. He has an extra set of his clothing in his inventory for you to use and will level with the player
NOTE: Bandana and eye patch not included with this mod. You can find them at the following links:

Bandana: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20900/
Eye Patch: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1874/

Download them and give them to Snake to complete his look.
author: Doc117
